column4: also i have to use command line txt based only apps since im using a screen reader I'm not transitioned to orca in the GUI
unlike windows where i can use window eyes or jaws its touch learning a new screen reader im visually impared so cli programs are easiest for me
so I need to find programs that are easy to install so i dont have to compile
Chances are that a lot of the program you want are already in the repos or can be installed through PPAs so they can be handled by apt
